title: Ethereum Privacy Ecosystem overview
description:
I want to present the Ethereum Privacy Ecosystem report that Web3Privacy now collective is doing:

- highlighting the state of Privacy in Ethereum (helicopter/ecosystem viewpoint)
- presenting a structural map of privacy-focused projects, EIPs & R&Ds, hackathon projects, and funding mechanisms
- backed by the data: X projects from Railgun to Firn, Y hackathons from ETHBerlin to ETHRome, Z funding from Gitcoin (example: Rotki) to VC (Aztec)
- sharing public & open research links
